verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%> upon <S%H7799>Shoshannim<s%>, for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah<s%>, <S%H4905>Maschil<s%>, A <S%H7892>Song<s%> of <S%H3039>loves<s%>. My <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H7370>inditing<s%> a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>matter<s%>: I <S%H559>speak<s%> of the things which I have <S%H4639>made<s%> touching the <S%H4428>king<s%>: my <S%H3956>tongue<s%> is the <S%H5842>pen<s%> of a <S%H4106>ready<s%> <S%H5608>writer<s%>. Maschil: or, of instruction is inditing: Heb. boileth, or, bubbleth up

Thou art <S%H3302>fairer<s%> than the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>: <S%H2580>grace<s%> is <S%H3332>poured<s%> into thy <S%H8193>lips<s%>: therefore <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H1288>blessed<s%> thee for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
<S%H2296>Gird<s%> thy <S%H2719>sword<s%> upon thy <S%H3409>thigh<s%>, O most <S%H1368>mighty<s%>, with thy <S%H1935>glory<s%> and thy <S%H1926>majesty<s%>.

And in thy <S%H1926>majesty<s%> <S%H7392>ride<s%> <S%H6743>prosperously<s%> <S%H1697>because<s%> of <S%H571>truth<s%> and <S%H6037>meekness<s%> and <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>; and thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%> shall <S%H3384>teach<s%> thee terrible <S%H3372>things<s%>. ride: Heb. prosper thou, ride thou
Thine <S%H2671>arrows<s%> are <S%H8150>sharp<s%> in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H341>enemies<s%>; whereby the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> under thee.
Thy <S%H3678>throne<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, is for <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever<s%>: the <S%H7626>sceptre<s%> of thy <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> is a <S%H4334>right<s%> <S%H7626>sceptre<s%>.

Thou <S%H157>lovest<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, and <S%H8130>hatest<s%> <S%H7562>wickedness<s%>: therefore <S%H430>God<s%>, thy <S%H430>God<s%>, hath <S%H4886>anointed<s%> thee with the <S%H8081>oil<s%> of <S%H8342>gladness<s%> above thy <S%H2270>fellows<s%>.

All thy <S%H899>garments<s%> smell of <S%H4753>myrrh<s%>, and <S%H174>aloes<s%>, and <S%H7102>cassia<s%>, out of the <S%H8127>ivory<s%> <S%H1964>palaces<s%>, <S%H4482>whereby<s%> they have made thee <S%H8055>glad<s%>.

<S%H4428>Kings'<s%> <S%H1323>daughters<s%> were among thy honourable <S%H3368>women<s%>: upon thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%> did <S%H5324>stand<s%> the <S%H7694>queen<s%> in <S%H3800>gold<s%> of <S%H211>Ophir<s%>.

<S%H8085>Hearken<s%>, O <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, and <S%H7200>consider<s%>, and <S%H5186>incline<s%> thine <S%H241>ear<s%>; <S%H7911>forget<s%> also thine own <S%H5971>people<s%>, and thy <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>;
So shall the <S%H4428>king<s%> greatly <S%H183>desire<s%> thy <S%H3308>beauty<s%>: for he is thy <S%H113>Lord<s%>; and <S%H7812>worship<s%> thou him.

And the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> shall be there with a <S%H4503>gift<s%>; even the <S%H6223>rich<s%> among the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H2470>intreat<s%> thy <S%H6440>favour<s%>. favour: Heb. face
The <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> is all <S%H3520>glorious<s%> <S%H6441>within<s%>: her <S%H3830>clothing<s%> is of <S%H4865>wrought<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>.

She shall be <S%H2986>brought<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> in raiment of <S%H7553>needlework<s%>: the <S%H1330>virgins<s%> her <S%H7464>companions<s%> that <S%H310>follow<s%> her shall be <S%H935>brought<s%> unto thee.
With <S%H8057>gladness<s%> and <S%H1524>rejoicing<s%> shall they be <S%H2986>brought<s%>: they shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1964>palace<s%>.
Instead of thy <S%H1>fathers<s%> shall be thy <S%H1121>children<s%>, whom thou mayest <S%H7896>make<s%> <S%H8269>princes<s%> in all the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

I will make thy <S%H8034>name<s%> to be <S%H2142>remembered<s%> in <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>: therefore shall the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3034>praise<s%> thee for <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever<s%>.
